body:
So basically, I fucked up big time, and didn't learn from my past mistakes. (What I'm referring too; 
https://gyazo.com/74fbcb05b481df24977aa1a9d63b8408

Yeah, so when you see that you know I'm gone for good. I'm pushing to get unbanned on ts, but that will mainly be the only Avicus platform I'll be active in.

Thank Yous...

Qrysis/Proxy;

These guys are not my team, they're my family.. I don't know what I would've done without them. We all cheer each other up, and we always work through things as a family, not individually and I couldn't ask for a better team.

Elsa;

A great person and my best friend :) I don't know what I would do without you, I'd be lost and most likely no where good.

Jess;

You've helped me so much in the past month with my irl problems, and you've got my hopes up and helped me so much I could never repay you.

Jackson;

You're like the only one I really talk to A LOT. To me you're like that brother I never had. You were there a lot for me as well when shit happened and I never can thank you enough.

Tiger;

We've had so many ups and downs but we've pushed that aside and worked together to get our friendship back. I hope we can fix things now and hang out sometimes on ts, cya <3

TheOriginalMad;

Your stupid posts brightened my day every single time I red them. Keep up the good work xD but don't get too spammy :P

My reasons for this,

Well, I'm never being unbanned from Avicus, I've got some bad things going on irl right now and I need to think about them for awhile. Loss of lots of family members recently, and school which Is my #1 priority atm. I've also been offered a job, and it's my 2nd dream job so I can't pass that offer down.

I will still be active on skype and play other things but want to cut away for awhile..

P.s, if I didn't thank you it's because we didn't talk much, but I'm thanking everyone for the best 3 years of my life. I wish every single person here the best of luck in life, and there future <3 even greg :P
-Dawson

P.P.s, if you care or want to know about the irl stuff, just hmu on skype. I'm willing to talk about anything now. Skype; danfromyoutube


P.P.S, I will be giving Qrysis to Cammy, Crazy, Apollo, Random, Mustafa, and Steven_ <3!

replies.body:
This is real sad and disappointing to hear man..
I'm sorry about the personal shit going on, my sympathy goes to you and your family, but on the game side of things, I am a little pitiful, I have to admit, because you got banned twice now. Being banned once must have obviously been for plausible reasons, but 2 times banned is just unacceptable man, i wish you didn't evade and tried to figure things out less sophisticatedly.

Anyway, I dont think I really knew you, but good luck man :) :/

Anyway, I dont think I really knew you, but good luck man :) :/
